1.title: From Quaint to Crack Rocks: Jersey's Riviera Motor Inn

8.title: The Amazing Jungle Room: Miami Princess Hotel

This time, the guys visit Miami for an exploration of the historic exotic themed Miami Princess Hotel. The lobby is surprisingly clean and charming, which alone is a true standout for this series. 15.title: Squalor in the Sunshine - Tampa's Regency Inn and Suites
15.plot: Dan Bell, Will Krupinsky and Rick Serra bring their investigative skills and remarkably high tolerance for the disgusting back for this 15th addition to the popular Another Dirty Room series. Joined on this journey by Jake Williams of Bright Sun Films, the guys are bringing their blacklights, swabs and strong stomachs to Tampa, FL to discover just how clean (or, in this case, incredibly dirty) the Regency Inn and Suites really are. And to say hello to a very large colony of roaches.

-1.title: Check Out Time: Another Dirty Room 11 Commentary + Crazy Lady Bonus Footage!
-1.plot: Dan Bell, Will Krupinsky and Rick Serra revisit the scene of the grime at the disgusting Swan Motel in Halethorpe, MD. Until they inspected Detroit's notorious Royal Inn, this is the worst motel room they had ever visited. In a series dedicated to discovering America's nastiest motel and hotel rooms, that's really saying something. This "Check Out Time" not only adds highlights to the blacklights with commentary, but includes bonus footage of the crazy lady who stopped by as well.
